title: Why does the Higgs boson like Mexican hats?
itunes:title: Why does the Higgs boson like Mexican hats?
description:
Daniel and Jorge talk about the strange properties of the Higgs boson, and why its special powers are linked to a sombrero.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
